title: Great Location 2 bedroom 1 bath
posting_body: Available 1 Bedroom for rent in a 2 Bedroom1 bath space; corner lot apartment, located in a nice cozy neighborhood by the Westchester-LA border Area.

There is only 1 person occupying the other bedroom in this gorgeous location within a couple miles to LAX, very close distance to schools (LMU, Pepperdine ext., UCLA), hospitals (Kaiser, Centinela hospital etc.)and freeways (105 and 405).

There is a fifty inch TV in the living room area, newly installed stove/oven, newly installed washer & dryer by the kitchen, a treadmill in the living room, and a spacious walk-in closet in your fully furnished bedroom.
Hardwood floors throughout and Wifi super speed AT&T fiberoptics free access internet.
You don't worry about any bills except for your monthly rent.
You'll have to see it to believe it.
Lots of parking in the street or neighbor can rent you space for a small fee each month.
Asian guy next door so a person with the same gender is most preferred.
Please feel free to contact anytime.
The apartment is not a room for rent but going to be leased together as an equal tenant/renter.
The apartment is very close to the beach.
Bike lane available between 8-12 minutes ride to “Marvin Braude Bike Trail”.
It is a 22 mile trail that connects Rancho Palos Verdes all the way to the Malibu beach shoreline.
